mapper.insert: insert into post_reply (post_id, answer_id, user_id, content, target_user_id, target_reply_id, anonymity) VALUES (#{postId},#{answerId},#{userId},#{content},#{targetUserId},#{targetReplyId},#{anonymity})
mapper.update: update post_reply set reply_times = #{replyTimes} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id,post_id,user_id,content,target_user_id,target_reply_id,anonymity,reply_times,liked_times,create_time from post_reply where post_id = #{id} order by create_time DESC
